com.palomamobile.android.sdk.core.qos

Class DefaultRetryPolicyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palomamobile.android.sdk.core.qos.DefaultRetryPolicyProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRetryPolicyProvider

    public class DefaultRetryPolicyProvider
extends Object
implements IRetryPolicyProvider
    Default simple implementation of the IRetryPolicyProvider. To provide a different system wide provider pass your custom implementation to ServiceSupport.setRetryPolicyProvider(IRetryPolicyProvider). Each job can also specify it's own retry policy by overriding it's BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob.shouldReRunOnThrowable(Throwable, int, int) method.

      RetryConstraint shouldReRunOnThrowable(BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob job, Throwable throwable, int runCount, int maxRunCount)
      Default implementation returns:
    • exponential backoff for network exceptions with response code >= 500 (server error) or with missing response code (network not reached).

      • shouldReRunOnThrowable

        public RetryConstraint shouldReRunOnThrowable(BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob job,
                                     Throwable throwable,
                                     int runCount,
                                     int maxRunCount)
        Default implementation returns:
      • exponential backoff for network exceptions with response code >= 500 (server error) or with missing response code (network not reached).
      • RetryConstraint#CANCEL all other exceptions
